script_functions.extract_data: Unzips data files from COCO dataset
script_functions.download_data: Downloads data files from COCO dataset
script_functions.eval: Evaluates the model using the 595_final_project.py script
script_functions.train: Trains the model using the 595_final_project.py script
script_functions.bleu: Calculates BLEU score using the 595_final_project.py script
